required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Role of a Motion Sensor With Accompanying Web Application on Step Counts, Energy Balance, and Metabolic Markers in Nurses
clinical_study.official_title: The Role of a Motion Sensor With Accompanying Web Application on Step Counts, Energy Balance, and Metabolic Markers in Nurses

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this prospective randomized controlled trial is to explore the role of a motion sensor with accompany web application on step counts, energy balance, and metabolic markers in nurses. Additionally, eating behaviours, behavioural regulation in exercise, and mood states that may impact these parameters will also be examined.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 6 weeks during observation and 6 weeks during intervention
primary_outcome.description: All participants will be asked to wear a Tractivity速 motion sensor device on their ankle for to assess their daily step count and physical activity energy expenditure

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening (week 1), Observation (weeks 2-5), during the intervention (weeks 6-9), post study at week 26 and week 52
secondary_outcome.description: Body weight will be measured using a digital scale to the nearest 0.1 kilogram

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening (week 1), Observation (weeks 2-5), during the intervention (weeks 6-9), post study at week 26 and week 52
secondary_outcome.description: Waist circumference will be measured using a tape measure

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening (week 1), Observation (weeks 2-5), during the intervention (weeks 6-9), post study at week 26 and week 52
secondary_outcome.description: Fat mass will be measured using bioelectrical impedance analysis

arm_group.description: Participants will be able to log onto their Tractivity速 Online web account at any time during the 4-week intervention phase to track their daily step counts and physical activity expenditure

Participants will be able to log onto their Tractivity速 Online web account at any time during the 4-week intervention phase to track their daily step counts and physical activity expenditure in comparison to the group average of all participants randomized to the friend challenge.

participants will be able to log onto their Tractivity速 Online web account at any time during the 4-week intervention phase to track their teams' daily step counts and physical activity expenditure in comparison to the group average of other teams.

intervention.description: To explore the role of a motion sensor with accompanying web application on step counts, energy balance, and metabolic markers in nurses
